title: Surrender Dorothy - 1998 [multiple underground festival awards]
description:
Surrender Dorothy (1998 - USA)

Comedy / Drama
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0140587/


WINNER - New York Underground Film Festival - Festival Award
WINNER - Chicago Underground Film Festival - Jury Award
WINNER - Slamdance Film Festival - Grand Jury Prize
WINNER - MicroCineFest - Grand Jury Award
NOMINATED - Cinequest San Jose Film Festival - Best Feature


This Philadelphia based black and white psychological drama was the Grand Prize winner at the 1998 Slamdance Film Festival. After heroin addict Lanh robs a dealer, he encounters restaurant worker Trevor who takes him in. However, the angry Trevor lusts for power and control. He quickly manipulates his new roommate into a master-slave relationship, forcing Lanh to pose in drag as "Dorothy," a creation who becomes the focus of Trevor's sexual aberrations and physical abuse.


Video: XviD, 704x384, 23.976 fps, 1557 Kbps, 01h27m15s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 224 kbps

DVDRip, DUAL English audio with commentary track, optional French subtitles
